Outsourced Marketing Services

t’s like car-sharing, but for marketing. You hire a specialist or a team to handle your projects. Often saving you more than hiring full-time staff

Trusted by companies like

When We Are Valuable to You

You’re unsure about the next steps

Sometimes teams hit a dead end because they run out of ideas or don’t know how to solve a problem

You’re tired of constantly hiring and changing specialists

With us, you don’t have to worry about recruitment, assessing skills, vacations, absences, or resignations. Our experts are always available and ready to tackle your challenges

Lack of expertise in your industry

We bring agency experience from over 1,000 projects with detailed post-analysis. We apply proven tactics that have delivered results in your field

You want to pay only for results

You set the task, and pay when it’s solved

How It Works

01. When You Need Additional Support
We can join your existing team or build a dedicated group of our specialists. We’ll take full responsibility for managing a channel or system — for example, seo.| We’ll participate in brainstorming sessions and help craft your competitive value proposition. Our team continuously monitors progress and adjusts the strategy to meet your goals.
02. When You Lack Expertise
Our team includes top specialists across all marketing channels, ready to collaborate with your team:
  • PPC Specialists
  • Social Media Advertising Experts
  • Content Marketers
  • Email Marketing Professionals
  • Analytics & Strategy Consultants
  • SEO Experts
03. When You Need A Systematic Approach
We conduct audits and set up analytics, including internal lead tracking. We connect channels and implement transparent reporting. You’ll gain clear insight into your marketing strategy and expected results — both short-term and long-term. This process typically takes 2–3 months.

PERFORMIQ for SaaS

Comprehensive Marketing Solutions for Software Companies

At Performiq, we specialize in delivering comprehensive marketing solutions specifically tailored for software companies. Our innovative approach encompasses all channels, ensuring that your message reaches your target audience effectively. We operate on a CPA (Cost Per Acquisition) model, which prioritizes producing measurable financial results over merely driving traffic to your website.

Results-Driven Strategy Focused on ROI

By implementing our CPA model, we concentrate on actual conversions and sales as the key metrics of success. This results-driven strategy prioritizes return on investment (ROI) for our software clients, guaranteeing that every marketing effort is strategically aligned with generating tangible financial outcomes. We believe in the power of data, measuring success through concrete results such as software licenses sold and leads converted into customers.

Continuous Refinement for Sustainable Growth

At Performiq, we understand that financial metrics are crucial for assessing performance. Our commitment lies in tracking these metrics diligently to continuously refine our marketing strategies. This ensures that each marketing dollar spent contributes effectively to our client's business objectives. With a multi-channel marketing strategy aligned with the unique goals of software companies, we foster sustainable growth and help you thrive in a competitive landscape. Partner with us to elevate your marketing efforts and achieve remarkable financial success!

Our Core Expertise

Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO)
Boost your conversion rates with a pay-for-performance model. We deliver data-driven solutions focused on user behavior — you pay only for measurable improvements.
SEO / Search Engine Optimization
Comprehensive optimization and promotion. Payment based on leads starting from the third month, with guarantees outlined in the contract. Clear reports with plan vs. actual analysis.
Pay-Per-Click (PPC) Advertising
Drive more leads without increasing your budget. Benefit from our proprietary bid automation and CPA optimization tools designed to maximize ROI.
E-commerce
Customized B2B/B2C strategies designed to boost website traffic, increase sales, and enhance brand awareness.
Content Marketing
Engaging articles and newsletters crafted to captivate your audience. Choose from one-time projects or comprehensive strategies with targeted content distribution.
